info.desc: A Python based automated test tool based on pexect

current.comment: refactoring/clean-up (is breaking change) and bug fixing
current.changes:
"- Changed file extension to .py (works better with editors)
- Changed the default logging semantics to always do verbose logging
- Added Host timestamps to the log file
- Fixed 'double logging of uut data' bug
- Requires Python 3.8 or higher
- Updated documentation

"

history.comment: remove native support for serial ports (was not portable in python)
